title: Overclocked

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, plan to guard a player. Your target is announced publicly to everybody at the start of the night.
- At night, optionally abandon your original target and choose a new target to actually guard.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When guarding a player, they are granted powerful defense, and you will attack all players that visit your target.
- You may target yourself once.

desc:
Post 1314
*Crap. Scheduled two jobs at the same time. What am I supposed to do...*
